review: works well, easy set up. Best part is you can take it ware ever you have a flat screen tv and wifi. Don't get amazon prime if you plan on watching full seasons of shows. They make you pay more once you get so far in to a series.

review: I bought this for my wife and she loves it.  I am so surprised how easy it was to install and it is easy to use.  I would recommend it to anyone.
author: James Clements

review: I was given this for Christmas.  At first I thought, oh well it is the thought that counts, as I have a Samsung Smart TV, which allows me to connect to many services already.  I installed the fire TV stick, and it works GREAT, so much easier, crisper and quicker than using the smart TV functionality.  My only complaint is that I cannot control it with my Logitech Harmony 650 remote.
author: Cat

review: Just got one.  Highly recommended by a friend. Its been great so far and was able to watch so many things-movie, tv, music etc. the possibilities are endless.

review: I cannot believe how easy this was to install.  However, it helps if you put the batteries in the correct way!  That would have saved me a lot of time.  I am technically inept and I had no trouble figuring it out (except for the batteries).  For the money, this was an excellent purchase.
